titles.title: Freight Restriction Elimination for Safer Hauling Act of 2019
To amend title 23, United States Code, with respect to vehicle weight limitations for certain vehicles hauling perishable commodities or products, and for other purposes.
Freight Restriction Elimination for Safer Hauling Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Freight Restriction Elimination for Safer Hauling Act of 2019
This bill allows a state to waive vehicle weight limitations for certain vehicles carrying perishable commodities or products on the Interstate Highway System within such state boundaries.
